alluxio.yarn

Class CommandBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.yarn.CommandBuilder

  • @NotThreadSafe
public class CommandBuilder
extends Object
    This class is used to build a string representing a shell command by adding arguments. TODO(binfan): to share this class into util.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandBuilder

        public CommandBuilder(String base)
        Parameters:
        base - the base string to use for constructing the command, e.g. for echo "hello world" this would be "echo"

    • Method Detail

      • addArg

        public CommandBuilder addArg(Object arg)
        Adds the string value of the given argument to the command.
        Parameters:
        arg - the argument to add
        Returns:
        the CommandBuilder with the argument added

      • addArg

        public CommandBuilder addArg(String opt,
                             Object arg)
        Adds the string value of the given option argument to the command. For example, to add "-name myFile" to construct the command "find . -name myFile", opt should be "-name" and arg should be "myFile".
        Parameters:
        opt - the option flag
        arg - the argument
        Returns:
        the CommandBuilder with the argument added

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
